txt_welcome_header_main.message: Well behaved browser tabs for Zendesk agents

txt_welcome_header_hook.message: Click a Zendesk agent link from anywhere, and Zendesk TabGrab will automatically find your existing Zendesk tab and open the link there instead.

txt_welcome_body_what_do.message: If you already have Zendesk open, clicking a ticket or user link will focus that existing tab instead of opening a clutter of new ones.

txt_welcome_header_new_browser_tab.message: Can I still open links in a new browser tab?

txt_welcome_body_new_browser_tab.message: Yes. You can temporarily disable Zendesk TabGrab via the extension popup. Tip: Pin Zendesk TabGrab to your browser toolbar for easy access. The icon shows your status: (On) or (Off).

txt_welcome_header_lose_work.message: Would that cause me to lose work?

txt_welcome_body_lose_work.message: No. The extension talks directly to the interface, telling it where you would like to navigate. The interface will keep all your work safe.

txt_welcome_header_what_links.message: What links does this work for?

txt_welcome_body_what_links.message: Any agent link, which is any link with /agent after the domain. Tickets, users, views and even admin pages.
